com.ibm.disni.rdma.verbs

类 IbvMr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.rdma.verbs.IbvMr
  • 直接已知子类:
    NatIbvMr

    public class IbvMr
extends Object
    Represents a memory region registered with the RDMA device. Users should use the regMr verbs call to register memory and obtain a memory region.

        public long getAddr()
        Gets the address of the memory associated with this MR.
        返回:

      • setLength

        Unsupported.
        参数:
        length - the new length

      • getLkey

        public int getLkey()
        Gets the local key of the memory associated with this MR. Local keys can be passed around to enable accessing this memory from remote nodes.
        返回:
        the local key.

      • setLkey

        public void setLkey(int lkey)
        Unsupported.
        参数:
        lkey - the new lkey

      • getRkey

        返回:
